game.name: Stick It!
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 스윙하고, 회전하고, 날아오르자! Stick It!은 각운동량을 무기로 삼는 빠른 속도의 물리 기반 플랫폼 게임입니다. 움직임의 기술을 익히고, 역동적인 환경을 정복하며, 혼돈의 멀티플레이에서 친구들과 경쟁하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Swing, spin, and launch your way to victory in Stick It!, a fast-paced physics-based platformer where angular momentum is your greatest tool. Master the art of movement, conquer dynamic environments, and challenge your friends in chaotic multiplayer races to the top!

reviewHighlights.text: Stick It!, developed by Jovial Studios and published by indie.io, is an inventive physics-based platformer that reimagines movement and precision thro...
